alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A developing thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alleghany County in northwestern North Carolina and south central Grayson Counties in southwestern Virginia through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a slow moving, developing thunderstorm over Bridle Creek, or near Mouth Of Wilson, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain will produce ponding of water on the roads and poor visibility. Locations impacted include... Sparta... Independence... Stratford... Twin Oaks... Bridle Creek... and Piney Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
